mapper.select: SELECT eg.group_uuid as groupUuid, eg.external_group_id as external_id, eg.external_identity_provider as externalIdentityProvider, g.name as name FROM external_groups eg LEFT JOIN groups g ON eg.group_uuid = g.uuid WHERE eg.external_identity_provider=#{identityProvider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from external_groups where group_uuid = #{groupUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
